bill_title: to require each county to employ a building inspector.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require each county to employ a building inspector. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 11-2-4 be amended to read as follows: 11-2-4. To carry out the purposes of this chapter, the board may employ a planning director and inspector or either of them and such any staff as it the board deems necessary; or the board may contract with a planning agency, authority, or commission, or with planning consultants, or with other specialists for such services as it the board requires. Section 2. That chapter 11-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: To carry out the purposes of this chapter, the board shall employ a building inspector and any staff the board deems necessary; or the board may contract with any planning agency, authority, commission, planning consultants, or other specialists to act as a building inspector. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
